move:
occurs(move(Id), Frame) :- static(Id, Frame, false), disappear(Id, Frame+1).

occurs(move(Id), Frame) :- static(Id, Frame, false), holds(rotation(Rotation1, Id), Frame), holds(rotation(Rotation2, Id), Frame+1), Rotation1=Rotation2.
rotate left:
occurs(rotate_left(Id), Frame) :- static(Id, Frame, false), holds(rotation(Rotation1, Id), Frame), holds(rotation(Rotation2, Id), Frame+1), Rotation1=0, Rotation2=3.

occurs(rotate_left(Id), Frame) :- static(Id, Frame, false), holds(rotation(Rotation1, Id), Frame), holds(rotation(Rotation2, Id), Frame+1), Rotation1=3, Rotation2=2.

occurs(rotate_left(Id), Frame) :- static(Id, Frame, false), holds(rotation(Rotation1, Id), Frame), holds(rotation(Rotation2, Id), Frame+1), Rotation1=1, Rotation2=0.

occurs(rotate_left(Id), Frame) :- static(Id, Frame, false), holds(rotation(Rotation1, Id), Frame), holds(rotation(Rotation2, Id), Frame+1), Rotation1=2, Rotation2=1.
rotate right:
occurs(rotate_right(Id), Frame) :- static(Id, Frame, false), holds(rotation(Rotation1, Id), Frame), holds(rotation(Rotation2, Id), Frame+1), Rotation1=3, Rotation2=0.

occurs(rotate_right(Id), Frame) :- static(Id, Frame, false), holds(rotation(Rotation1, Id), Frame), holds(rotation(Rotation2, Id), Frame+1), Rotation1=1, Rotation2=2.

occurs(rotate_right(Id), Frame) :- static(Id, Frame, false), holds(rotation(Rotation1, Id), Frame), holds(rotation(Rotation2, Id), Frame+1), Rotation1=0, Rotation2=1.

occurs(rotate_right(Id), Frame) :- static(Id, Frame, false), holds(rotation(Rotation1, Id), Frame), holds(rotation(Rotation2, Id), Frame+1), Rotation1=2, Rotation2=3.
